sorular.soru: Which markings are youÂ not allowed to cross?

feedback.metin: You are only allowed to cross a broken line. You are not allowed to cross a solid line. The solid edge line is an exception to this. You are allowed to drive over a solid edge line, for example to park on the verge, or to reach an adjacent parking bay or lay-by. You may never drive over a dividing point or hatched road markings (gores).
